name: Michael Teaches Mandarin
description:
Made with the generous support of my friends and the wonderful and talented Heidy Wang.

Game A Week #1 Next Game
(Also for itch.io "Word Jam")

WASD = Move
Space = Jump
R = Restart
M = Return to menu

Mouse and 1,2,3 to navigate main menu.

This game uses a screen flash for visual feedback when the score increases, if you are sensitive to this it can be disabled at any time by pressing E

What is it? A Chinese trainer I built to keep my vocabulary sharp, and one that can potentially be expanded to include more words/categories. After twelve correct answers you can no longer rely on matching colors to get correct answers, the player is forced to memorize characters instead, therefore hopefully picking up some basic mandarin. I'd like to note that the word list used in this game comes from worksheets from my Chinese teacher Heidy and I am by no means an expert, please take the information presented with a grain of salt knowing that I am not a native speaker.
